services-virtual-page: Virtual Stores in Santos | Zakta Technology
virtual-page-text-1: For those who sell products, having a virtual store is essential to increase your sales!
virtual-page-text-2: Virtual stores work as an online showcase for your products and allow your customers to make purchases quickly, conveniently and securely.
virtual-page-text-3: Zakta develops different types of virtual stores and has the necessary expertise to propose and create the store that is most appropriate for your business.
virtual-page-text-4: We create virtual stores with your company's visual identity, modern design, excellent usability and fully adapted to cell phones and other mobile devices.
virtual-page-text-5: Our virtual stores are integrated with payment gateways such as Mercado Pago, Paypal, PagSeguro, in addition to having freight integration with the main services such as Correios, Melhor Envio, Jadlog, among others. We also work with other different online store tools and platforms.
virtual-page-text-6: We are able to create the ideal virtual store for your business. Contact us and tell us what you need.
